scripts.install:all: npm install && concurrently "cd backend/login-service && npm install" "cd backend/chat-service && npm install" "cd backend/chess-service && npm install" "cd backend/api-gateway && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently -n "login,chat,chess,gateway" "npm run dev:login" "npm run dev:chat" "npm run dev:chess" "npm run dev:gateway"
scripts.clean: npm run kill-ports && rm -rf */node_modules package-lock.json */package-lock.json && docker-compose down
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run docker:up && npm run install:all && npm run dev
